ability.name: Vectored Thrusters
ability.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Boost] action.

pilots.name: Arvel Crynyd
pilots.caption: Green Leader
pilots.ability: You can perform primary attacks at range 0. If you would fail a [Boost] action by overlapping another ship, resilve it as though you were partially executing a maneuver instead.

pilots.name: Green Squadron Pilot
pilots.text: Due to its sensitive controls and high maneuverability, only the most talented pilots belong in an A-wing cockpit.

pilots.name: Jake Farrell
pilots.caption: Sage Instructor
pilots.ability: After you perform a [Barrel Roll] or [Boost] action, you may choose a friendly ship at range 0-1. That ship may perform a [Focus] action.

pilots.name: Phoenix Squadron Pilot
pilots.text: Led by Commander Jun Sato, the brave but inexperienced pilots of Phoenix Squadron face staggering odds in their battle against the Galactic Empire.
